The purpose of this script is to compare DTU between mouse and worm

```{r load packages and set seed}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(IsoformSwitchAnalyzeR)
  library(ComplexHeatmap)
  library(viridis)
  library(org.Ce.eg.db)
  library(gprofiler2)
  library(styler)
  library(lintr)
  library(here)
})

set.seed(123)
```
